divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a object Hovering about 2000 to 3000 feet above the ground north of Michigan Ave (US-12)i watched it for over 20 Minutes driving between Clinton and Saline. also saw it looking West Near I-94 and US-23. It had no wings and no rotors I dont beleve it is a ballon or parachute there was no movment. Ive been a Air Museum tour guide Volanteer at air shows And have worked For major airlines for over 20 years I know my aircrat and I dont know of any that can hover at 2000 feet for 20 minutes.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Saline
There were no other sightings in Saline on or around November 4th 2011
